Ọnwụ nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ (aha US: Mandela's Fight For Freedom) bụ aha usoro akwụkwọ akụkọ nwere akụkụ atọ gbasara mkparita ụka iji kwụsị ịkpa ókè agbụrụ na South Africa na ntuli aka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nke mbụ sochiri.  Ebu ụzọ gbasaa usoro a na Mee 1995, ma bụrụ Brian Lapping Associates (nke bụ akụkụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Ten Alps ugbu a) maka BBC, nke onye mgbasa ozi Dutch VPRO, onye mgbasa ozi South Africa SABC na onye mgbasa ozi Japan rụpụtara ya.
Ọ bụ Allister Sparks dere ma nyochaa usoro ahụ, onye kọwakwara ya
Usoro ahụ so akwụkwọ Sparks, nke akpọrọ Tomorrow Is Another Country.
